item.title: Kickstarter spotlight: Customizable, reusable clothing in an instant
item.description:
SiDi Huang, the creator behind ZipSeam, has developed an innovative solution for achieving a tailored look without the need for traditional sewing. ZipSeam offers a quick and easy way to create secure, temporary seams in loose clothing, providing a better fit for the wearer. This invention has a wide range of applications, from the modeling industry and hand-me-downs to simply adjusting the fit of clothes you love. It’s no surprise that this project has garnered significant attention and support...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/kickstarter-spotlight-customizable-reusable-clothing-in-an-instant/
